SELECT a.board_id AS boardId, b.category_name AS categoryName, a.writer, a.title, a.content, a.count, a.board_pw, a.board_repw, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM board a left join category b ON a.category_id=b.category_id
WHERE b.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%') OR a.writer LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%') OR a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%') OR a.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
WHERE b.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
WHERE a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
WHERE a.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY a.board_id DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{rowSize}
